name: Gramps G
greetingText: I hope you enjoyed your trip!
wishText: May the poke force be with you ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah here's some pokemon cards...
text2: That's what I was planning to do honestly LMAO.
text4: I realised, I wanted to overwork myself and do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
